import React, {useState } from 'react'; const EditAccountPage = ({ user }) => { const [account, setAccount] = useState({ firstName: user.firstName, surname: user.surname, password: '', confirmPassword: '', location: user.location, education: user.education, workExperience: user.workExperience, skills: user.skills, salary: user.salary, jobType: user.jobType }); const edit = () => { } const handleChange = (event) => { const accountCopy = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(account)); accountCopy[event.target.name] = event.target.value; setAccount(accountCopy); } return ( <>

Edit Account
